metadata.title: CVE-2016-10937 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
IMAPFilter through 2.6.12 does not validate the hostname in an SSLcertificate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10937` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imapfilter - 1:2.6.13-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imapfilter package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.6.13-1').
